title: Wolf Family Simulator
description: Wolf Family Simulator is an adventure simulation game where you play as a wolf. Hunt and fight with wild animals for survival. Explore the open world, find your soulmate at level 10, and have a cub at level 20. Try to survive in a dangerous forest by increasing your health, energy, and damage to each family member. Try different breeds such as gray wolf, Indian wolf, and others. Fight with forest bosses like bears, tigers, boars, and many other animals. Complete quests and receive daily gifts to help you on your survival journey! Become the strongest in this autumn forest!
